{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:35.760
    | text      = I don't know what your relationship was growing up with Advent calendars.

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:41.840

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:51.120
    | text      = But I think at a certain point, my parents wanted to snuff out the joy in my life.

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
